name: Lileep

passive.name: Ancient Power
passive.effect: You may play Lileep from your hand as a Basic Pokemon. If you do, place 4 damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Spontaneous Growth
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokemon that evolve from Mysterious Fossil. Put them on the Bench (Ancient Power does not activate). Shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Lileep heals for half the amount of damage dealt, rounding down.

flavor: These ancient plants went extinct because of a Minior impact.
